front.title: An information model atchitecture of network device

abstract.t: Currently, network equipment already has some Northbound Interfaces, such as SNMP, NETCONF, TL1; and some languages are also provided to describe the data model, such as MIB, SCHEMA and even YANG. While till now, there is not a clear defined information model. In NETCONF domain, some standards are being defined. In order to reduce the cost of NMS integration in customer side, a clear defined information model is necessary, just like the SID in TMF.
